title: Django Templates and Template Language
description: Creating HTML templates with Django template language for dynamic content
content:
Django Templates and Template Language

Templates are HTML files with Django template language that allow you to generate dynamic content.

Template Directory Structure

Create template directories in your blog app:

blog/
├── templates/
│   └── blog/
│       ├── base.html
│       ├── post_list.html
│       ├── post_detail.html
│       └── about.html

Base Template

Create blog/templates/blog/base.html:




    
    
    {% block title %}My Blog{% endblock %}
    


    

        

            My Blog
            

                Home
                About
            

        

    

    
    

        {% block content %}
        {% endblock %}

Post List Template

Create blog/templates/blog/post_list.html:

{% extends 'blog/base.html' %}

{% block title %}Latest Posts - My Blog{% endblock %}

{% block content %}


    

        
Latest Blog Posts

        
        {% for post in posts %}
        

            

                

                    
                        {{ post.title }}
                    
                

                

                    By {{ post.author.username }} on {{ post.published_date|date:"F d, Y" }}
                

                
{{ post.content|truncatewords:30 }}

                Read More
            

        

        {% empty %}
        
No posts available yet.

        {% endfor %}
    

    
    

        

            

                
About This Blog

                
Welcome to my personal blog where I share thoughts and experiences.

            

        

    



{% endblock %}

Template Language Features

  • Variables: {{ variable }}
  • Tags: {% tag %}
  • Filters: {{ variable|filter }}
  • Comments: {# comment #}
